with a small chance to drop <itemName id=|Money|/>.

While in team, increases Attack of <uiCommon id=|COMMON_ELEMENT_NAME_Earth|/> Pals. 
Sometimes drops <itemName id=|PalOil|/> when assigned to <mapObjectName id=|MonsterFarm|/>, 
with a small chance to drop <itemName id=|Money|/>.

TextData.SourceString:
While in team, 
<characterName id=|TentacleTurtle_Ground|/> helps carry supplies, 
decreasing the weight of armor in the player's inventory. 
Also increases Attack of <uiCommon id=|COMMON_ELEMENT_NAME_Earth|/> Pals.
TextData.LocalizedString:
While in team, 
<characterName id=|TentacleTurtle_Ground|/> helps carry supplies, 
decreasing the weight of armor in the player's inventory. 
Also increases Attack of <uiCommon id=|COMMON_ELEMENT_NAME_Earth|/> Pals.

TextData.SourceString:
When activated, <characterName id=|KendoFrog_Dark|/> swells its abdomen and channels its loyalty to build up energy.
Climbing on top will propel the player high into the air.
While in team, increases Attack of <uiCommon id=|COMMON_ELEMENT_NAME_Dark|/> Pals.

When activated, <characterName id=|KendoFrog_Dark|/> swells its abdomen and channels its loyalty to build up energy.

TextData.SourceString:
Can be ridden to travel on water. 
Changes the player's attack type to <uiCommon id=|COMMON_ELEMENT_NAME_Ice|/> while mounted.

Can be ridden to travel on water. 
Changes the player's attack type to <uiCommon id=|COMMON_ELEMENT_NAME_Ice|/> while mounted.

Can be ridden. 
While fighting together, the fishing minigame 
starts with the capture gauge higher than usual. 
Additionally, the capture gauge fills faster 
when the bar is aligned.
